extendedInfo.description: Realistic fishing for your Android device!  Hold and flick your phone just like a fishing rod, and mimic the same movements that you would in real life when casting, retrieving the lure, and fighting the fish. Fishin' 2 Go takes advantage of your phone's accelerometer and vibrator to give you the most realistic fishing experience possible.This is the LITE/DEMO version of Fishin' 2 Go. LITE Features:Physical controls using the accelerometer (casting, etc).Realistic fish behavior & intelligence.3 scenic fresh & saltwater locations (FULL version has 16 including exotic locations like the Amazon)32 different species of fish to catch (FULL version has 100+ species)11 different lures/baits (FULL version has 80+)Customize your gear setup with different line weights & hook sizes.No web records, profiles, skill levels, kids mode, challenges, unlockables or save/send catches in LITE.  Buy the FULL version  for those and more!Support FAQ: http://www.fishin2go.com/supportFacebook Page:http://www.facebook.com/fishin2go*** Please check out our other game, Sea Shooter, on the Android Market!  ***

reviews.comment: Really fun. I fish a lot in real life so this is a great 2nd to actually going fishing. Its really realistic and there are tons of fish to catch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: This game is depressing. Your line breaks on every fish. It is like fishing with paper line. Would be a nice game, but no dice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It would be good if it didn\'t keep freezing and force closing when i cast please fix ( motorola citrus)

reviews.comment: My 8 yr old son loves this game! And I love the nature sounds! Best of both worlds.

reviews.comment: Was great until new phone now I only have light version.  What\'s up with that.\tHelp me get my paid version back
reviews.author: Donald Stark

reviews.title: Favorite outdoor sport
reviews.comment: I always loved to fish ever since my Dad took me when I was a little girl.  My 2nd husband & I had a boat, we went out on it every chance we got.  Now I am on disability, I barely ever leave my room.  I can\'t go anywhere since my car died 2 yrs ago.  I depend on my son to take me and my 87yr old mother to our doctor appt.  This game is fun and almost realistic.  Helps pass my boring days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lets go fishing!!!!
reviews.comment: So life like you almost  smell the fish frying in the pan best fishing app out beats all but buggy your bat can be at 120 feet and jump to thy top of the water by its self our after 2 cranks of the real and even if select heavy wght gear line brakes ezy but when works its grate PS so fake big fish run just whin hook gits near not realistic
reviews.author: Tony Manchaca

reviews.title: Can\'t reel in fish.
reviews.comment: I installed the demo version on my SE X10 MiniPro and I can\'t even reel in the fish after the hook has been set and everything. When I cast out the line, I can use the reel and it works but whenever I caught a fish, the reel stops working and it doesn\'t move at all. This sucks :(
